author: AP
title: Sen. Rand Paul tests positive for virus, forcing quarantines
description: “The coronavirus has hit the Senate today,” said McConnell, R-Ky. “It’s not just back in our states but right here in the Senate.”
content:
Sen. Rand Paul of Kentucky has tested positive for the novel coronavirus, becoming the first case of COVID-19 in the Senate and raising fears about the further transmission of the virus among Republicans at the Capitol.
Sen. Paul, an eye surgeon, went into q… [+4880 chars]
